CatDescriptText: Rhumba Theatre, owned by Jacob Soltz, and located at 53 Fullerton Street in the Hill District by 1938.  It originally showed silent movies, with musical accompaniment from a piano player or record player.  In the background are several movie posters, including one for "Copper Sky" released in 1957.
TitMainTitle: Large group portrait of men, one wearing clerical collar, women, and children, posed in front of the Rhumba Theatre on Fullerton Street, Hill District
